auxil.gui.punch_card.title: Puncher
create.ponder.writer_intro.header: The Usage and Applications of a Punch Card Writer
create.ponder.writer_intro.text_2: They also require a card to read from
create.ponder.writer_intro.text_3: Once the Writer is given a redstone signal on the input side, it begins to read from the other side
create.ponder.writer_intro.text_4: Each bit of data represents the presence of a redstone signal in pulse mode...
create.ponder.writer_intro.text_5: And the strength of a redstone signal in analog mode
create.ponder.reader_automation.text_1: If the reader does not have a card, one can be inserted from the top
create.ponder.reader_automation.text_2: When a Writer finishes writing to a card, it can be taken from the bottom
create.ponder.reader_intro.header: The Usage and Applications of a Punch Card Reader
create.ponder.reader_intro.text_2: They also require a card to read from
create.ponder.reader_intro.text_3: When all conditions are met, they will read and output the data inside the punch card
create.ponder.reader_intro.text_4: Each bit of data represents the presence of a redstone signal in pulse mode...
create.ponder.reader_intro.text_5: And the strength of a redstone signal in analog mode
create.ponder.writer_automation.text_1: If the writer does not have a card, one can be inserted from the top
create.ponder.writer_automation.text_2: When a Reader finishes reading a card, it can be taken from the bottom
create.ponder.sequencer.text_1: A Sequencer must be right clicked with a punch card to be given instructions
create.ponder.sequencer.text_2: It will output the instructions once given a redstone signal
create.ponder.sequencer.text_3: Sequencers can be right clicked with an empty hand to retrieve the card inside
create.ponder.windup.text_2: They will release the stored energy when given a redstone signal
create.ponder.windup.text_3: Although they can only store 5 seconds of rotation at the maximum
create.ponder.sprinkler_intro.text_1: The Sprinkler only needs water to function
create.ponder.sprinkler_intro.text_2: When given water, it will grow any growable blocks in its area
create.ponder.sander.text_1: The Mechanical Sander can sand any sandable item
create.ponder.sander.text_2: It's sand paper will never wear out
create.ponder.sander.text_3: It can sand items inside basins as well
create.ponder.radiant_chassis.text_1: Radiant Chassis can select an area to effect
create.ponder.radiant_chassis.text_2: The affected area cannot contain more than 27 blocks
create.ponder.radiant_chassis.text_3: They will move all blocks inside the area as if they are attached
